705560.name: Zombidle - Passion Pack
705560.description:
Roses are red, violets are blue, get this pack if your stench is true? Time to get greasy up in here with the Passion Pack, it's like a walrus* filled with the usual goodies you all desire, like bloodstones, shiny shiny diamonds, shards and a HAT, well ... "HAT"; it will make you look like the manliest of man that made poor (or the best depending on who you are asking) lifestyle decisions.

Includes:

  • x4 Skull drop. (+2 green shards)
  • x4 DPS boost (+2 yellow shards)
  • Best deal on diamonds (+500 diamonds)
  • A truck full of bloodstones for good measure (+75 bloodstones)
  • Exclusive Fernando's Essence "hat"
  • *Walrus not included
705560.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 简体中文
